items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: RiftJS: A lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Riot Games API, providing easy access to League of Legends game data.

items.content_html: An experimental online marketplace simulation inspired by modern e-commerce platforms. Built with Next.js for a fast and dynamic frontend, and powered by Prisma with PostgreSQL for efficient database management. Currently a work-in-progress, aiming to replicate core marketplace features in a lightweight and fun way.
items.title: AlphaIsYour/tokoeno: An experimental online marketplace simulation inspired by modern e-commerce platforms. Built with Next.js for a fast and dynamic frontend, and powered by Prisma with PostgreSQL for efficient database management. Currently a work-in-progress, aiming to replicate core marketplace features in a lightweight and fun way.

items.content_html: A lightweight 2D open-world survival game starter kit using React, Vite, and SpacetimeDB. Designed for developers who want to build real-time multiplayer survival games with persistent world state, customizable characters, and rich crafting mechanics.

Designed for developers who want to build real-time multiplayer survival games with persistent world state, customizable characters, and rich crafting mechanics.

items.content_html: A powerful, lightweight memory debugging and analysis toolkit for game hacking and reverse engineering using Frida.
items.title: MswTester/gdbg: A powerful, lightweight memory debugging and analysis toolkit for game hacking and reverse engineering using Frida.

items.content_html: DOBBER is a lightweight, modular agent framework that lets AI securely manage revenue-generating DePIN devices. Built for real-world automation, it enables on-chain coordination, reward routing, and intelligent operations—turning physical machines into autonomous digital businesses. DEMO: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZXGQbEimumg

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: The Notes App is a lightweight React-based web app showcasing secure authentication and note management (create, edit, delete, pin, search). With a cohesive purple-themed UI, smooth animations, and plain CSS, it offers a simple, reliable, and scalable prototype for note-taking solutions.

With a cohesive purple-themed UI, smooth animations, and plain CSS, it offers a simple, reliable, and scalable prototype for note-taking solutions.

items.content_html: Simple Shop A lightweight e-commerce template built with React and Material-UI. Features a fully functional shopping cart, checkout dialog, and dynamic product listing. Ideal for developers learning React state management and building modern web interfaces. Contributions welcome!
